section.title: Other Services
section.para: The Broker can also contain Access Control Providers, Group Providers, Keystore, Trustores and Management Plugins.

section.title: Access Control Providers
section.para: Access Control Providers are used to authorize the access to the various Broker objects.
The ACL configuration and management details are covered in .

section.title: Group Providers
section.para: Group Providers are used to aggregate Broker authenticated principals into groups which can be used to define ACL rules applicable to the whole group.
The Group Provider configuration and management is covered in .

section.title: Keystores
section.para: Keystore are used to configure keystores holding SSL keys and certificates for the SSL transports on Ports.
The Keystore configuration and management is covered in .

section.title: Truststores
section.para: Truststore are used to configure keystores holding SSL certificates for Client Certificate Authentication on SSL ports.
The Truststore configuration and management is covered in .
